entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
